payment.title: Payment
payment.description: Choose one of the available subscriptions on our service
payment.featuresFree2: Limited usage for individual healthcare providers.
payment.benefitsFree1: Ideal for small hospitals and clinics.
payment.benefitsFree2: No cost involved; enjoy fundamental healthcare services at no charge.
payment.featuresPro2: Advanced tools and functionalities tailored for healthcare settings.
payment.benefitsPro1: Perfect for medium-sized hospitals and clinics.
payment.benefitsPro2: Access to premium healthcare features for improved patient care.
payment.featuresEnterprise0: Custom plan for hospitals or groups
payment.featuresEnterprise1: Comprehensive suite of tools and services for large-scale healthcare organizations.
payment.featuresEnterprise2: Scalable solutions designed for the unique needs of corporate healthcare.
payment.benefitsEnterprise1: Tailored solutions for corporate healthcare needs.
payment.benefitsEnterprise2: Priority support and dedicated healthcare resources.
payment.benefitsEnterprise3: Ideal for large hospitals, medical networks, and healthcare enterprises.
